message.body: Hey tomorrow can you show me where u put the bottle from last weeks creation? I see the top and the fluid but not the bottle- it belongs to the cleaning co.
Well shit bc the bottle broke last week upon all the throwing so it was leaking... Im sorry - I can pay for a new one
Ok we can all chip in I'm just worried they'll look for it tomorrow bc they usually come on Tuesday's
Yea, well maybe they can use another? Should I tell someone?
I'm sure they can for tomorrow but we should offer to replace since we broke
Cool thanks or I can too just Lmk
